description:
Construction of 4-5-storey affordable housing courtyard development of live/work units and flats, including stepped access to elevated garden at rear. 

 APPLICANT'S PLAN NOS.:  1358/AS/OB, OGB RevB, 01B RevB-08B RevB
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of five years from the date of this permission. 

 REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
